text: Right to access personal data
Right to rectification of inaccurate personal data
Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
Right to data portability
Right to object to processing including profiling
Automated individual decision-making including profiling
Data protection by design and by default
Records of processing activities
Security of processing
Notification of a personal data breach to the supervisory authority
Communication of a personal data breach to the data subject
Data protection impact assessment
Designation of the data protection officer
General principle for transfers
Transfers on the basis of an adequacy decision
Transfers subject to appropriate safeguards
Derogations for specific situations
General duties of businesses that collect personal information
Consumers right to delete personal information
Consumers right to know what personal information is being collected
Consumers right to know what personal information is sold or disclosed
Consumers right to opt-out of sale of personal information
Consumers right of non-discrimination
Personal information security breaches
GDPR Article 5 - Principles relating to processing of personal data (lawfulness, fairness, transparency, purpose limitation, data minimization, accuracy, integrity and confidentiality).
GDPR Article 7 - Conditions for consent (freely given, specific, informed, unambiguous affirmative action).
CCPA ยง 1798.100 - General duties of businesses regarding consumer rights and privacy notices.
CPRA ยง 1798.121 - Right to Limit Use of Sensitive Personal Information (analogous to VCDPA's sensitive data protections).
CPA ยง 12-110-102 - Definitions and scope (similar thresholds and consumer rights framework).
